body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for contacting RT 6 Boozers. My name is Sarah, and I'm here to assist you today.

Hi, Sarah! I'm looking for some information about your happy hour specials.

Of course! I'd be happy to help with that. May I start by getting your name?

My name is Mark.

Great to meet you, Mark! To better assist you, could you please provide your email address?

Sure, it's marktaylor@email.com.

Thank you, Mark! I also need your phone number for our records. Could you provide that?

It's four zero three, two one five, eight nine four one.

Thank you for that information, Mark. Now, regarding our happy hour specials, we offer discounts from five PM to seven PM, including fifty percent off select drinks.

That sounds fantastic! I’ll definitely plan to come by.

Wonderful! Thank you for your time, Mark. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
